name: weddingshare
description: WeddingShare is a self-hosted photo and media sharing platform for weddings and events. Guests can upload, view, and download pictures in a private, beautifully themed gallery.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Allow wedding guests to upload photos and videos from the celebration in real-time

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Create password-protected galleries accessible only to invited guests for privacy

features.title: Bulk Upload
features.description: Enable guests to upload multiple photos at once from smartphones or cameras

features.title: Download Options
features.description: Let guests download individual photos or entire albums in high resolution

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Provide an optimized experience on mobile devices where most guest photos are taken

features.title: No Registration Required
features.description: Allow guests to participate without creating accounts or providing personal information

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Customize the gallery appearance with wedding-themed designs and couple's photos
